Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac
Review Text: Very cozy place near to the Centraal station. Wide range of draught and bottled beers with normal prices (~4,75â‚¬). I really liked the location with the bridges, canal and people. Absolutely recommended in Amsterdam

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac
Review Text: Great bar.  Will try the food next time.  Good service.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac
Review Text: Very nice place at a great location - cozy crossroads at the brigde away from the crowd. Beer at a fairly cheap prices. We tried the local fried meatballs (bitterballen) and these were amazing with mustard!

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac
Review Text: Very good salads and nice atmosphere, however, forgotten full ashtray on the table costs one star

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac
Review Text: The first time I was in Amsterdam I decided to do some bar hopping, I visited one first, then went to Cafe Tabac and didn't want to leave, but I went to a couple more anyway.... no, I came back to finish my night there. It was a little late â€¦

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac
Review Text: Wonderful atmosphere! Very friendly and nice staff. We enjoyed the great view from the windows and didn't even want to move from there much. The menu options are not many, but this place has some magic inside :)

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac
Review Text: Great experience, on the canals with some nice Zatte from Browerij 't IJ. Also food super nice, we took amazing bitterballen.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac
Review Text: This place is very Amsterdam. Hip, cool and friendly at a beautiful location. One of my favourite places to have some drinks and snacks.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac
Review Text: Our favorite bar in Amsterdam. Great location and wonderful people watching. Crazy intersection with cars and bikes and walkers going in every which way. Fun lay down seats outside.  We love the bartenders and particularly the waiter named Richard, he is outstanding! Our favorite place in town! And the food is amazing!

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac
Review Text: Love it ! Thank you for helping me when I was sick with your fresh Jus es . Especsily the CARROT i love it

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac
Review Text: Nice cafÃ©/pub located at the picturesque corner of the Prinsengracht and Brouwersgracht in the Jordaan District of Amsterdam. Full lunch and dinner Asian-style menu, including mains. Friendly staff and relaxed atmosphere.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac
Review Text: Good spot. Just out of the crowd. Great service and good food!

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac
Review Text: Beautiful pub and very kind staff! I can't say that's super cheap for my standards, but given the quality and the quantity of the food the price I paid for my lunch was absolutely honest. The spicy chicken sandwich was great. â€¦

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac
Review Text: Okay pub. Didn't get the hype.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac
Review Text: Last night in Amsterdam was fantastic and was time well spend here! Thank you for some great shrimp tempura, some great beer, and some even greater conversation.Tom [If i remember correctly] was the bartender and was awesome and great to talk to. Thanks for a great experience!

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac
Review Text: Lovely selection, great service and the best location!! I love grabbing a pint here and watching the canal, the prices are great and the service is perfect! I plan to come back so many times!

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac
Review Text: Favourite bar in Amsterdam. Excellent for people watching during the day and very cosy inside at night time. Go here for a sunny day and sit out on cushions on the roof. â€¦

Review Text:
Tabac is a great Cafe with wonderful staff on an amazing location in Amsterdam.

Both loved by locals and visitors of our great city.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac
Review Text: As a foreigner living in Amsterdam for about six months, I was used to being disregarded as a regular tourist in most restaurants and bars. All the staff and bartenders at Tabac, on the other hand, were genuinely kind people - more than â€¦

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Tabac
